name: Auftragsberatungsstelle Brandenburg e.V.
membership:
Ständige Konferenz der Auftragsberatungsstellen (www.abst.de)
Forum Vergabe (www.forum-vergabe.de)
memberOrga: Industrie- und Handelskammern sowie Handwerkskammern des Landes Brandenburg
goal: As an intermediary between the contracting authorities in the Land of Brandenburg and the economic operators the association has the task to promote the appropriate participation of companies from industry, commerce and trade in public procurement.
interests: Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Internal Market
